explains: n. 民族自决；自我决定

sentences.en: He said the republic now had an inalienable right to self-determination.
sentences.cn: 他说，该共和国现在拥有不可剥夺的自决权。

sentences.en: Kwanzaa is based on seven principles which are unity, self-determination, collective work and responsibility, cooperative economics, purpose, creativity and faith.
sentences.cn: 宽扎节以团结、自主、集体工作和责任、合作经济、目标、创造力和信仰这七个原则为基础。

sentences.en: The right to self-determination, particularly for indigenous people like Greenland’s Inuit, more commonly known as Eskimos, was a recurring theme this weekend.
sentences.cn: 自我决定权，尤其是对格陵兰因纽特原居民，即常说的爱斯基摩人来说，是本周末活动的重复主题。
